snippet: Jobless, grieving for his mother and hooked on heroin, Rickey Henegan spent years panhandling until his fear drove him to seek treatment.
lead_paragraph: Jobless, grieving for his mother and hooked on heroin, Rickey Henegan spent years panhandling until his fear drove him to seek treatment.
abstract: Community Service Society gives Rickey Henegan of Manhattan, formerly homeless and drug-addicted, $175 grant to cover cost of his New York State security guard license and his Fireguard and Fire Safety certificate along with funds for monthly MetroCard.

headline.main: Fear of Dying Alone Drove a Panhandler to Seek Drug Rehabilitation
headline.print_headline: Fear of Dying Alone Drove a Panhandler to Seek Drug Rehabilitation

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Community Service Society of New York

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
